description: This is an HTML file that implements the user interface for a database visualizer, including a sidebar listing databases, tables, and a main content area for data display and interaction. It contains embedded CSS for styling and JavaScript for dynamic data fetching and UI updates.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting current selections and updating UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the table list for a specific database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and renders the data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display table data with wider content handling.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates table cell HTML, handling objects, long strings, and null values.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data.
